data.comment: The match is underway. Saint Petersburg have kicked-off.
Andrey Mostovoy (Saint Petersburg) strikes at Otkritie Arena but his header is cleared.
In the minute 3, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Otkritie Arena.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Roman Zobnin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Spartak Moscow attack but Samuel Gigot's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 11, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Malcom (Saint Petersburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Moscow Saint Petersburg drive forward through Malcom. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 17, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 21, Saint Petersburg's Yaroslav Rakitskiy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
Saint Petersburg's Andrey Mostovoy is on target but unsuccessful.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Artem Dzyuba for the away team is judged to be offside.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 26, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Saint Petersburg's Magomed Ozdoev misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 28, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
In Moscow Saint Petersburg attack through Artem Dzyuba. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 30, Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Aleksandr Yerokhin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, In Moscow, Aleksandr Yerokhin of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Aleksandr Yerokhin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Moscow, Artem Dzyuba (Saint Petersburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 32, Saint Petersburg's Malcom gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 37, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Douglas Santos (Saint Petersburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 39, Pavel Kukuyan signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Spartak Moscow are coming forward and Ezequiel Ponce gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Saint Petersburg are whistled for offside.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 42, Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Spartak Moscow's Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 45, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Spartak Moscow kick-off.
In the minute 46, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Saint Petersburg push forward at Otkritie Arena and Artem Dzyuba gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
In Moscow Saint Petersburg drive forward through Douglas Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Aleksandr Yerokhin for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Otkritie Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Magomed Ozdoev for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Douglas Santos (Saint Petersburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
Aleksandr Sobolev is replacing Zelimkhan Bakaev for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Otkritie Arena.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Oston Urunov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 57, Magomed Ozdoev (Saint Petersburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Saint Petersburg drives forward and Malcom gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg is whistled offside.
In the minute 62, In Moscow Spartak Moscow attack through Ezequiel Ponce. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint Petersburg goal kick.
In Moscow, Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 64, Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
Saint Petersburg's Malcom is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Aleksandr Yerokhin.
In the minute 65, Artem Dzyuba instrumental with a fine assist.
Alex Kral (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Artem Dzyuba is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 70, Artem Dzyuba is back on the pitch.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Viacheslav Karavaev's finish is wide of the goal.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) is making a first substitution, with Sardar Azmoun replacing Andrey Mostovoy.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Otkritie Arena.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan blows against Saint Petersburg's Aleksandr Yerokhin for offside.
In the minute 78, Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 80, Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce breaks free at Otkritie Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow make their second substitution with Andrey Eshchenko replacing Oston Urunov.
Ezequiel Ponce gets an equalizer for Spartak Moscow. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 86, Alex Kral with an assist there.
Saint Petersburg's Viacheslav Karavaev is whistled for offside at Otkritie Arena.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 88, Saint Petersburg's Wilmar Barrios has been booked in Moscow.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 89, Dejan Lovren is booked for the away team.
Important block from the Saint Petersburg defence as Ayrton Lucas fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Spartak Moscow push forward at Otkritie Arena and Dmitry Markitesov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Saint Petersburg defence.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
That's full-time at Otkritie Arena. The final score is 1-1.
The home team replace Jordan Larsson with Dmitry Markitesov.
Sergey Semak is making the team's second substitution at Otkritie Arena with Daniil Krugovoy replacing Malcom.
The away team have replaced Magomed Ozdoev with Aleksey Sutormin. This is the third substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Andrey Eshchenko (Spartak Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
